titleStmt.title: The prelatical church-man against the phanatical Kirk-man, or, A vindication of the author of The sufferings of the Church of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Author of The sufferings of the Church of Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A reply to Animadversions on the sufferings of the Church of Scotland. cf. p. 2.
